about_the_game:
This Modern themed package can be used to dress up your Female characters properly for Halloween. Nurses and demons are ready for the party!
The output resolution of this pack is 1010 x 1200 pixels.

Content usable by all Season #2 Female characters:
- 15 skins
- 5 colourable hairs
- 5 hair presets
- 9 hats
- 2 full set of clothes
- 6 boots
- 6 pants
- 2 suits
- 12 tops
- 3 under armors
- 1 armguard
- 3 chest items
- 1 earring
- 6 handheld items
- 3 headwears
- 4 horns
- 2 necklaces
- 3 loin clothes / skirts
- 2 tails
- 7 tattoos
- 2 tights
- 11 waist items
- 2 wings

Additional content available to all Season #2 Modern themed packs in the General category:
- 13 backgrounds
- 2 companions
- 9 effects
- 7 items

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1370 x 770 pixels
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel i3 @ 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2560 x 1440 pixels or higher desktop resolution
